title: Chimera: A Novel
description: The world is descending into an anti-cosmopolitan dystopia. A cosmopolitan man, locked in a cell, tells a story of a night in New York, when he had a chance encounter with a radical young woman, member of the Cosmopolitan Brigades, a violent group fighting the advancing Anti-Cosmopolitan Movement. He falls in love with her and as they flee together across Somalia, the Balkans and the Alps, he tries to save her from her self-destructive impulses and rescue her from the clutches of the other members of the Cosmopolitan Brigades. But how did he end up in the cell? And what really happened that night in New York? A twisted love story, a bizarre travel adventure and a satirical political thriller. A story about our sense of responsibility for whatâ€™s going on around us as well as about the idea of openness and the power of illusions.
author: Alexandros Yannis
